Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
@RestController public class Controller extends Object
This class is the controller of the possible routes for the server
Author:
Porfiri Pierandrea, Staffolani Federico

  • Method Details

    • getallData

      @GetMapping("data") public ArrayList<FileModel> getallData()
      Route to get all the files and folders from the Dropbox account
      Returns:
      ArrayList of FileModel

    • getStatsOnDates1

      @GetMapping("stats/dates/mostrecent/{extension}") public DataModel getStatsOnDates1(@PathVariable String extension) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the date of editing of all the files in the Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      extension - the extension
      Returns:
      DataModel of the most recent file
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnDates2

      @GetMapping("stats/dates/leastrecent/{extension}") public DataModel getStatsOnDates2(@PathVariable String extension) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the date of editing of all the files in the Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      extension - the extension
      Returns:
      DataModel of the least recent file
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnSize1

      @GetMapping("stats/size/biggestfile/{extension}") public String getStatsOnSize1(@PathVariable String extension) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the size of all the files in the Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      extension - the extension
      Returns:
      String with the name and the size of the biggest file among the ones with the given extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnSize2

      @GetMapping("stats/size/smallestfile/{extension}") public String getStatsOnSize2(@PathVariable String extension) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the size of all the files in the Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      extension - the extension
      Returns:
      String with the name and the size of the smallest file among the ones with the given extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnSize3

      @GetMapping("stats/size/higherdim/{size}") public String getStatsOnSize3(@PathVariable Integer size) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the size of all the files in the Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      size - the size used for comparison
      Returns:
      String containing the number of all the files bigger than the given size, divided for extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnSize4

      @GetMapping("stats/size/lowerdim/{size}") public String getStatsOnSize4(@PathVariable Integer size) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the size of all the files in the Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      size - the size used for comparison
      Returns:
      String containing the number of all the files smaller than the given size, divided for extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnSharedFiles

      @GetMapping("stats/shared/extension/{extension}") public String getStatsOnSharedFiles(@PathVariable String extension) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the quantity of shared files per extension in a Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      extension - the extension
      Returns:
      String with number of shared files for the extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getStatsOnSharedFolders

      @GetMapping("stats/shared/folder") public SharedModel getStatsOnSharedFolders(@RequestParam(name="path") String path) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to calculate the statistic on the quantity of shared files per folder in a Dropbox account
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the folder
      Returns:
      SharedModel with the total of shared files and the number of their respective extensions
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • exceptionHandler

      @ExceptionHandler(IllegalParameterException.class) public String exceptionHandler(IllegalParameterException exception)
      Exception handler
      Parameters:
      exception - the exception
      Returns:
      Error message

    • getFilterExt

      @GetMapping("/filter/ext/{extension}") public ArrayList<FileModel> getFilterExt(@PathVariable String extension) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to get all the filtered data based on the files' extensions
      Parameters:
      extension - the extension
      Returns:
      ArrayList of FileModel
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getFilterDate

      @GetMapping("/filter/date/{date}") public ArrayList<FileModel> getFilterDate(@PathVariable String date) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to get all the filtered data based on the date the files were last modified on
      Parameters:
      date - the date
      Returns:
      ArrayList of FileModel
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • getFilterName

      @GetMapping("/filter/name/{letter}") public ArrayList<FileModel> getFilterName(@PathVariable char letter) throws EmptyListExc
      Route to get all the filtered data based on the first letter of the files' names
      Parameters:
      letter - the first letter of the file's name
      Returns:
      ArrayList of FileModel
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

      path - the path
      Returns:
      ArrayList of FileModel
